description: Non-human beings in suffering - animals, wildlife, endangered species

targets.name: Shelter Animals Awaiting Adoption (US)
targets.description: Approximately 6.3 million companion animals enter US shelters annually
targets.intention: May all shelter animals find loving forever homes, may no animal be euthanized for lack of space

targets.name: Factory Farm Animals
targets.description: Approximately 10 billion land animals and 50+ billion aquatic animals slaughtered annually in US alone for food
targets.intention: May all factory farmed beings be free from suffering, may humanity evolve toward compassion

additional_data.estimated_count: 10 billion land animals US, 80+ billion globally

targets.name: Animals in Research Laboratories
targets.description: Estimated 100+ million animals used in experiments globally each year
targets.intention: May all laboratory animals be treated with compassion, may alternative methods replace animal testing

targets.name: Endangered Species - Mammals
targets.description: Over 1,300 mammal species critically endangered or endangered (IUCN Red List)
targets.intention: May all endangered species populations recover, may their habitats be protected

targets.name: Endangered Species - Birds
targets.description: Over 1,400 bird species critically endangered or endangered
targets.intention: May all endangered bird species thrive, may their ecosystems be restored

targets.name: Endangered Species - Marine Life
targets.description: Thousands of marine species threatened with extinction
targets.intention: May all endangered marine life recover, may oceans be healed

targets.name: Wildlife in Conflict Zones
targets.description: Animals suffering in war zones, landmine areas, areas of armed conflict
targets.intention: May all animals in war zones be protected, may they find peace and safety

targets.name: Animals Displaced by Climate Change
targets.description: Millions of animals losing habitats due to climate change, fires, floods, droughts
targets.intention: May all climate-displaced animals adapt and survive, may humanity address climate change with urgency

targets.name: Stray and Feral Animals (Worldwide)
targets.description: Hundreds of millions of stray dogs and cats worldwide living in harsh conditions
targets.intention: May all stray animals find food, shelter, and compassionate human care

additional_data.estimated_count: 200+ million stray dogs, 600+ million stray cats globally

targets.name: Wildlife Victims of Poaching
targets.description: Thousands of animals killed annually by poachers (elephants, rhinos, pangolins, etc.)
targets.intention: May poaching cease, may all animals be protected, may poachers find other livelihoods
